title: Rosie Ramsey's Halloween costume goes epically wrong when no one can tell who she is
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Rosie Ramsey's Halloween costume went hilariously wrong when none of her mates could tell who she is.

Chris Ramsey 's wife hosts a Strictly Come Dancing party every Saturday night to cheer him on as he competes in the show.

And since it's Halloween week, she decided to dress for the occasion.

Rosie, who hosts weekly podcast S*****d Married Annoyed with her comedian husband, decided to dress up as Stranger Things character Billy.

The resemblance is uncanny thanks to her double denim, mullet wig and moustache, but it seems to have fell flat with her family and friends.

Rosie took to Instagram to reveal her transformation and said people wrongly guessed she was dressed as George Michael, Pat Sharp and Patrick Swayze.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The actress and singer said: "There’s only three people at this party who have actually watched Stranger Things and I’m one of them. FFS. ️ #billy #strangerthings

"*Guesses I’ve had so far..... George Michael. Pat Sharp. Jason Donovan. Patrick Swayze. Chris Waddel (?!?) Barry Venison (?!) The bloke who tries to knick Ted in the film Ted."

The post left her fans in stitches.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: BBC/Guy Levy)

One said: "Omg this is the absolute best ever . I had to look twice to see it was you"

Another commented: "OMG that’s genius"

And one reassured her: "You have nailed it!!! I knew you were Billy before I read the caption!!!!"

Rosie, who has confessed on her podcast that her weekly Strictly parties have been leaving her a little worse for wear, also posed up for an adorable snap with son Robin, who she shares with husband Chris.

(Image: Instagram)

The little one, who turns four tomorrow, was dressed up as a Ghostbuster in a cute pair of beige overalls bearing the logo, and with his very own proton pack.

On tonight's Strictly, Chris, who is paired with Karen Hauer, sent a special birthday message to his son.

description: Chris Ramsey's wife hosted a special Halloween party to cheer him on during this week's Strictly Come Dancing
